meanings.definition: Silly or foolish in a way that is endearing or amusing.
meanings.sent1: He wore a dorky hat to the party.
meanings.sent2: Her dorky jokes always make us laugh.
meanings.sent3: The dorky dance he did was hilarious.
meanings.sent4: She had a dorky grin on her face all day.
meanings.sent5: The dorky puppy chased its tail in circles.

meanings.definition: Awkward or socially inept in a way that is charming or lovable.
meanings.sent1: His dorky attempts at flirting were adorable.
meanings.sent2: She felt dorky trying to fit in with the cool kids.
meanings.sent3: The dorky way he asked for her number made her smile.
meanings.sent4: Her dorky charm won over everyone at the party.
meanings.sent5: The dorky penguin waddled clumsily on the ice.
